column5: 53 F south shore 56 north shore. Haven't found the bluegill mother load yet.

Keep looking...They're there...CPH and I got a bunch last Tuesday besides some slab crappie...  Yesterday my bro-in-law and I got bluegills but no crappie...  A twister tail a foot and a half under a slip float...

Got a bunch yesterday from one of my shore spots on Sturgeon...there was nothing there last weekend though. It should be prime when we are up from May 13-23  for a weeks holidays. The spot Beansie and I got them last Tuesday is always an early spot. Lotsa spring/early summer locations should be starting up anytime now.
